body: This was happening frequently on the linux-arm builders until April 29th and hasn't happened since. My guess is that the memory corruption fixed that day by 4d1ab2d was the cause, especially since the problem first showed up on the dashboard on April 22nd, which was the day TestNewOSProc0 was introduced (ca9128f), which, if I understand correctly, triggered the memory corruption. Please reopen if you think we should dig in to this more.
